rule_summary: Ads must be clear, truthful, and high-quality with accurate titles, original images, correct categorization, and complete information.
detailed_rules: Ad titles must accurately reflect the item/service being advertised, not just generic terms like 'vehicle' or 'FOR SALE'
Remove contact numbers, prices, excessive punctuation, special characters, emojis, and fancy fonts from ad titles
Images must be original, relevant, and free from watermarks, screenshots, generic stock photos, or AI-generated styled images
No images depicting nudity, sex, violence, cruelty, neglect, racism, or discrimination
Price details must be clear; if missing, suggest editing price to 'contact me'
Category placement must be correct; suggest corrections if misplaced
Ad text should contain clear, detailed information about what is being advertised
No links to competitor website ads are allowed
Social media and business site links are allowed if related to ad content; YouTube product spec links not allowed
Refrain from duplicated ads (same content within 7 days, across regions/categories, or with jumbled text)
No foul language, defamatory comments, racism, sexism, or discrimination
Owner/Business Type verification requires human review
violation_example: Ad titled 'FOR SALE 082-555-1234 R5000!!!' with screenshot images from another retailer
allowed_exception: Social media and business website links are welcomed if related to ad content
rejection_reason: More Info, Generic Inappropriate, Images Not Related

rule_summary: Prohibits ads for illegal, inappropriate, or non-compliant content including pirated media, weapons, adult content, and restricted items.
detailed_rules: No political or religious advertisement advocating specific groups or beliefs
No adult content including sensual/sexual massage, sex toys/services, personal ads, or pornographic media
No ads with warnings or complaints against other ads or traders (use system flag option instead)
No third-party data sharing or 'leads for sale' ads (POPI Act compliance)
No tobacco or tobacco products including vaping liquids/pods (devices and accessories allowed)
No alcohol or alcohol-related products (vintage wines allowed as collector's items if not available retail)
No ads for illegal content, goods, activities, services, or substances
No hacking or bypassing paid products services
No pirated media (music, software, movies, e-books, games) sold on external memory
No pirate copies or copyright infringement of brand names in clothes, handbags, accessories
No eBook/Kindle/Kobo data or software (devices allowed if price is all-inclusive)
No gambling ads or links to gambling websites/apps
No requests for money or airtime donations (clothes, food, furniture donations allowed)
No ads for hazardous materials like asbestos or mercury
violation_example: Ad offering pirated movies on USB drive, or requesting airtime donations
allowed_exception: Vaping devices and accessories allowed (not liquids/pods). Vintage wines as collector's items if not available retail. Internal downloaded games on Xbox/PlayStation allowed if clearly stated.
rejection_reason: Generic Inappropriate, Pirated Media, Work from Home

rule_summary: Specific brands are banned from advertising due to copyright/trademark protection with legal implications.
detailed_rules: Le Creuset cookware banned (exception: second-hand, one-off sales clearly marked as such)
AUTOCOM vehicle diagnostic tools banned
BONNOX fencing banned
100% Eyewear banned
FitLife products banned
DRIMAC jackets banned
FLOW beehives or any beehive with flow technology banned
PIGGYBACK trailers banned (only the Piggyback company itself can advertise their trailers)
SUPERDRY clothing brand banned
AUTODATA vehicle diagnostic software banned
violation_example: Ad selling new Le Creuset cookware set, or Flow beehive equipment
allowed_exception: Le Creuset items allowed only if second-hand and clearly stated as such for one-off sale. Piggyback company can advertise their own trademarked trailers.

rule_summary: Prohibits pirated or copied media, with exception for legitimately downloaded internal console games.
detailed_rules: No pirated media including music, software, movies, e-books, or games
If content is sold on any form of external memory, it is no longer original and not allowed
Internal downloaded games on Xbox and PlayStation 3+ consoles are allowed
Games must be downloaded from Xbox Live or PlayStation Store and stored on device hard drive
Ad must clearly state 'Internal games downloaded from Xbox Live/PlayStation Store'
violation_example: Xbox console ad mentioning games on external hard drive, or games without clarifying they are internal downloads
allowed_exception: Internal downloaded games on Xbox and PlayStation 3+ from official stores, clearly stated in ad
rejection_reason: Pirated Media, More Info (if internal game info missing)

rule_summary: Automatic weapons, explosives, and excluded firearms are prohibited with specific exceptions for certain items.
detailed_rules: No automatic weapons, exploding/fragmenting ammunition, grenades, bombs, explosive devices, rockets, or altered firearms
No parts of excluded weapons, imitations of excluded weapons, or ammunition for excluded weapons
Standard ammunition like hunting ammunition is allowed
No weapons/ammunition to swap for other goods/services
No wanted ads for firearms, ammunition, or weapons of any kind
violation_example: Ad offering automatic rifle parts or altered firearm
allowed_exception: Stun bolts used in slaughterhouses, antique firearms, air guns, tranquilizer firearms, paintball guns, deactivated firearms, and standard hunting ammunition are allowed

rule_summary: Ads from outside South Africa or with foreign contact details are prohibited unless local presence exists.
detailed_rules: Ads from outside South Africa are not allowed
Contact details must be local for users to view items being advertised
Service or items must be available in South Africa
Company base must be in South Africa
Look for international telephone numbers or mentions of foreign countries as service provider source
violation_example: Ad with +44 UK phone number or mentioning service based in Dubai
allowed_exception: International sellers allowed only if they have local South African presence and local contact details

rule_summary: Car dealerships must provide name and physical address; more than four cars from a seller constitutes dealership activity.
detailed_rules: Dealership NAME and PHYSICAL ADDRESS must appear in ad text
Advertising more than 4 cars at any given time is considered dealership activity, even if marked as 'owner' ads
Look for signs in images of dealership photos
Look for dealership language: financing arrangements, deliver nationwide, test-drive, documents required for application
Refrain from using more than one account to advertise for the same dealership
No vehicles advertised by several related dealerships causing stock duplication
Remove old stock when sold and keep active ads relative to actual cars available
Ensure vehicle specs are accurate regarding make, model, mileage, automatic/manual
violation_example: Seller with 6 car ads marked as 'owner' without dealership name and address in ad text
allowed_exception: None

rule_summary: Specific rules for vehicle advertising including import documentation and prohibited practices.
detailed_rules: No imported cars unless specifically stated that all paperwork/import documents are available
No ads indicating 'takeover of instalments' (wanted or on offer)
No ads stating 'Blacklisted/ITC clients welcome' on vehicles or property (prohibited by NCA)
No ads mentioning practice of or services for 'mileage correction' on vehicles
violation_example: Ad for imported vehicle without mention of import documentation, or ad offering takeover of car payments
allowed_exception: Imported cars allowed only if ad clearly states all paperwork and import documents are available

rule_summary: Property ads must not discriminate and RDP homes are prohibited from advertising.
detailed_rules: Property ads may not discriminate against race, religion, sex, or creed when advertising for sale or rent
No RDP homes for sale or to rent are allowed
When advertising accommodation to SHARE, may specify male/female preference only, no other exclusions, and only for shared accommodation
No ads for 'free accommodation' or accommodation in exchange for unspecified services
violation_example: Ad for RDP home for rent, or room rental excluding specific racial groups
allowed_exception: Male/female preference allowed only when advertising shared accommodation

rule_summary: Specific rules for food products, with conditional allowances for pet food and dairy requiring business verification.
detailed_rules: Fresh vegetables and unprocessed foods/feeds are welcome (corn, hay, beans, lucern, bird seeds/feed)
Catering companies advertising services or prepared meals for delivery are allowed
Dog/cat food (prepared animal feeds/pellets) allowed only if advertised by Pet Supply stores or Veterinary clinics with name in ad text
Dairy products (milk, cheese, ice cream) allowed only if ad contains company name and street address
NOT ALLOWED: frozen/fresh meat and eggs
violation_example: Individual selling pet food without being a pet store or vet clinic, or dairy products without company details
allowed_exception: Pet food allowed from vet clinics and pet stores with name stated. Dairy allowed with company name and street address. Fresh vegetables and unprocessed feeds allowed.

rule_summary: Strict rules for medical practitioners and products, requiring practice numbers and prohibiting various medical-related items and services.
detailed_rules: No use of or reference to virus names in ads as marketing tool (CORONA/COVID-19/AIDS/CANCER)
Medical/surgical face masks, hand sanitizer, surgical gloves only allowed for business advertisers with company name in ad text (homemade masks allowed)
No ads making medical claims to cure or treat any illnesses/medical conditions (physical or mental)
Ads for medical practitioners must include practice number in ad text
No ads for biological matter including organs for transplant, sperm (including animal), ova (including animal)
No ads seeking/offering surrogate motherhood
No ads seeking/offering adoption
No ads for medication (prescription or otherwise) including animal medication
No ads for herbal medication including CBD products
No ads for diet products or supplements
No ads for abortion services or abortion medication
No ads for cosmetic enhancement/surgery including penis/breast/bum/hips enlargements
No embalming powder, liquid, tools, or services
No ads for alternative medicine (spiritual healers, astrologists, crystal therapists, sangomas, traditional healers, herbalists, psychics)
violation_example: Medical practitioner ad without practice number, or ad claiming herbal product cures diabetes
allowed_exception: Homemade masks allowed. Medical practitioners allowed if practice number included.
rejection_reason: More Info (if practice number missing), Medical (for other medical policy violations)

rule_summary: Only casual job and job seeker ads allowed with full required information; work-from-home ads must meet strict criteria.
detailed_rules: Only CASUAL JOB ads and JOB SEEKER ads allowed on Junk Mail (other jobs should go to www.jobmail.co.za)
Casual jobs may not include: adult services, live-in maids/secretary 'willing to go the extra mile', nude model ads
Job seekers must be 18 or older with age stated in ad
Work from home ads allowed only if stating product/service being sold/offered, company name, and where product will be sold from
No non-descript 'sending of emails' or data entry online work-from-home ads
No pyramid schemes where income generated from registration fees alone
No stokvel ads
All casual job ads must contain: company name, location, contact number, job description/assignment, salary remuneration details
violation_example: Work-from-home ad offering 'data entry online' without company name or product details, or casual job missing salary information
allowed_exception: Work-from-home ads allowed if legitimate product/service with company name stated
rejection_reason: More Info Jobs (casual jobs missing details), Work from Home (non-compliant work-from-home ads)

rule_summary: Specific categories that can only be placed as paid commercial ads, not free ads.
detailed_rules: Financial services ads (loans, debt help, blacklisted assistance, get out of debt)
Rent-to-own vehicles
Medical aid/insurance/funeral policies (must include FSP info and underwriting company name with 'registered financial services provider' wording)
Livestock ads (cattle, sheep, pigs, goats) - animal policy still applies
Fireworks sale or event services
Petroleum products (petrol, diesel, biofuel) - must mention if licensed retail or wholesale distributor
Massage therapy/services - must include 'Registered practitioner in South Africa' per AHPCSA requirements (no sexual/sensual services)
violation_example: Free ad offering personal loans or debt consolidation services
allowed_exception: These services are allowed as paid commercial ads only

rule_summary: Comprehensive rules to ensure responsible pet ownership and animal welfare, prohibiting breeding operations and exploitation.
detailed_rules: No animals free to good home or giveaway ads
No animals to swap for other animals/services/goods
No animals sold for slaughter or meat (look for 'per kg' pricing or 'broiler chickens')
Minimum prices: small mammals (hamsters, rabbits, mice, guinea pigs, birds, poultry) = R50 each; all other animals (dogs, cats, horses, livestock) = R100 per animal
No pregnant animals for sale (watch for Afrikaans words 'dragtig/swanger')
No birds sold for hand-rearing
No geese/ducks advertised for plucking of feathers
No animals for live feeding of other animals (includes 'pienkies'/baby mice, day-old chicks)
No insects/bugs sold for live feeding of animals with explicit wording
No fertile eggs for hatching or day-old chicks of any poultry
No farmed animals or ads for work/mating/covering/stud/breeding services
No animals sold as 'breeding pairs' (except birds if not exotic or on exclusion list)
No teacup pigs
No animals on NEMBA lists (Invasive, Endangered, Prohibited) or CITES lists
No furs of any kind (faux fur must be stated)
No animal skins/hides except livestock skins (cow leather, sheep's wool)
No animal bones/horns, hunting trophies, ivory, elephant products, rhino horns/products
No donkeys for sale/wanted including hides or products
All animal ads must indicate province and city where located
violation_example: Ad offering free puppies, pregnant cow for sale, or day-old chicks
allowed_exception: Breeding pairs of non-exotic birds not on exclusion lists. Livestock skins like cow leather and sheep's wool allowed.

rule_summary: All animals must meet minimum age requirements before being advertised, with birth date or current age stated.
detailed_rules: All ads must state either BIRTH DATE or CURRENT AGE of animal being sold
Dogs and cats: minimum 8 weeks old (if not yet 8 weeks, must state 'ready at 8 weeks')
Rabbits: minimum 6 weeks old
Mice/guinea pigs/hamsters: minimum 4 weeks old
Livestock babies (calves, lambs, piglets, kids): minimum 8 weeks old
Foals: minimum 6 months (if sold WITH mare, min age not applicable but birth date still required)
Birds: larger species minimum 6 months (24 weeks); smaller species and poultry minimum 3 months (12 weeks); age must be stated
If birth date provided and animal not yet minimum age, ad must state 'Ready at [minimum age]'
violation_example: Ad for 6-week-old puppy without 'ready at 8 weeks' statement, or animal ad with no age/birth date mentioned
allowed_exception: Foals under 6 months allowed if sold with mare, but birth date still required
rejection_reason: More Info (if age/birth date missing), Inappropriate Pet Content

rule_summary: Tail docking, ear cropping, and wing clipping are illegal unless medically required and heavily restricted in ads.
detailed_rules: Tail docking illegal unless medically required (APA and veterinary act violation)
Ads for specific breeds MUST include clear image showing puppy tails: Jack Russell, Foxterrier, Doberman, Doberman Pincher, Boxer, Bullmastiff (also applies to cross breeds)
Cropped ears illegal unless medically required (APA and veterinary act violation)
Pinioning (wing clipping) - ads not allowed to mention pinioning or offer pinioning option/services
violation_example: Jack Russell puppy ad without images showing tails, or ad offering ear cropping services
allowed_exception: Medically required procedures only

section_title: Dogs and Cats - Sterilization and Restrictions
rule_summary: Dogs and cats over 6 months must be sterilized; puppy mills prohibited; various restrictions on dog-related activities.
detailed_rules: All dogs/cats 6 months and older must be sterilized with indication in ad text (sterilized/neutered/'fixed'/castrated/spayed)
Puppy mills not allowed (spotted by several breeds advertised simultaneously)
No dogs or cats wanted/looking for ads
No dogs wanted/offered as security/guard dogs, or training services for security/guard dogs
No ads for dog racing (illegal) or hunting using dogs
No training equipment or 'conditioning' equipment (dog treadmills, spring poles, flirt poles, shock collars, anti-barking collars)
No ads referring to 'game dog', quality of 'gameness', or 'game bloodline' (fighting dog terms)
No ads offering mating/covering/stud services
Only toy, miniature, or standard-sized breeds allowed (no TEACUP size of any breed)
violation_example: Ad for 8-month-old dog without sterilization mention, or multiple different breeds from one seller, or teacup Yorkie
allowed_exception: None for sterilization requirement. Toy (2.3-5.4kg, 15-38cm), miniature (5.4-10.9kg, 25-38cm), and standard (over 10.9kg, over 38cm) sizes allowed.

rule_summary: Comprehensive list of banned dog and cat breeds that cannot be advertised including cross breeds.
detailed_rules: Pit Bull Terriers banned
American Pit Bull Terriers banned
American Staffordshire Terriers (Amstaff) banned
Bull Terriers (Varkhond) banned
Staffordshire Terriers/Staffies banned
Japanese Tosas banned
Sharpeis banned
Malamutes banned (note difference from Huskies which are allowed)
Dogo Argentina (Argentinian Fighting Dogs) banned
Fila Brasileiro (Brazilian Fighting Dogs) banned
Boerboels banned
Miperro De Presa Canario banned
Rottweiler/Rottie banned
Wolves/Timberwolves banned
Red/Blue Nose Carvers (Pitbull breed) banned
Cane Corso banned
Dapple or double dapple Dachshund (also piebald/brindle) banned (note difference from normal Dachshund colors which are allowed)
Russian Blue cat breed banned
Savannah cat breed banned
NO cross breeds of any banned breeds
Ads must mention breeds; cross breeds must mention both breeds
ALL Dachshund puppy ads (even non-dapple) must contain images of puppies
violation_example: Ad for Rottweiler puppy, Staffie-mix cross breed, or dapple Dachshund
allowed_exception: Normal colored Dachshunds allowed (not dapple/piebald/brindle). Huskies allowed (not Malamutes).

section_title: Exotic Animals, Reptiles, Fish, and Birds
rule_summary: Extensive restrictions on exotic animals, reptiles, specific fish and bird species due to conservation, permits, and safety concerns.
detailed_rules: No venomous snakes (Boa Constrictors, Burmese Python, Copperhead, Ramsays Python, Sand Python, Diamond/Carpet Python, Cobra)
No Bearded dragons or Crested Geckos
No Chameleons
No Tortoises or Turtles (Leopard tortoises, Slider turtles)
No Terrapins
No Spiders (Baboon spiders, Wolf spiders, Tarantulas)
No exotic mammals (Sugar gliders, Sloths, Coati mundi, Foxes, Raccoons, Tenrecs, Squirrels, Mongooses, Dassies, Chinchillas, Hedgehogs, Ferrets, Shrews, Otters, Meercats, Moles)
No large predators (Lions, Tigers, Puma, Jaguar, Leopard)
No Caracal, Civet, Jackals, Wolves, Timberwolves, Dingo, Coyote or hybrids
No primates (Capuchin or Marmoset monkeys)
No Okapi, Oribi, Duiker, Steenbok, Impala, Springbok, Eland, Sable
No prohibited fish species (Catfish, Mosquito Fish, Piranha, Eels, all Cichlids, Crayfish, Bass, Plecos, Loaches, Ghost Shrimp, Trout, Salmon, all Tilapia, Common Carp/Koi)
Tank with fish ads MUST mention fish species included
No Stingrays

No prohibited birds (Macaw, Cockatoo, Sun Conure, Waxbills, Jardins, Rosella, Ringnecks, Crested quail, Turquoise parrot, Green cheeked conure, Gouldian Finch, Red-rumped parrot, exotic Parrots, birds of prey)
Aviary with birds ads MUST mention bird species included
No African Grey birds (Timneh parrot, Congo parrot)
No Helmeted Guinea Fowl
No African penguins
No Mallard ducks (invasive species); waterfowl ads MUST mention species
No Indian Myna
No birds of prey (Owls, Crows, Eagles, Falcons)
violation_example: Ad for Bearded dragon, African Grey parrot, tank with fish but no species mentioned, or exotic hedgehog
allowed_exception: None specified for these exotic/protected species

rule_summary: Rules for valuable items requiring documentation and restricted precious materials.
detailed_rules: No uncut diamonds for sale/advertising
Shaped/cut diamonds allowed only if ad states diamond grading certificate or proof of purchase available for buyer
No raw gold or platinum
violation_example: Ad offering uncut diamonds, or cut diamond without mentioning certificate availability
allowed_exception: Cut/shaped diamonds allowed with grading certificate or proof of purchase stated in ad

rule_summary: Ads must be for single items or related bundles, not unrelated items combined together.
detailed_rules: Ads including unrelated items together must be separated into individual ads
Each item should have its own ad in the appropriate category
violation_example: Single ad offering bicycle, microwave, and garden tools together
allowed_exception: Related items that naturally go together (e.g., console with controllers, furniture set)
